00001 #include "MusimatTutorial.h"
00002 MusimatTutorialSection(B0201c) {
00003         Print("*** Natural Chromatic Scale ***");
00004         /*****************************************************************************
00005          
00006          Natural Chromatic Scale
00007          
00008          To create the natural chromatic scale, all we need now is to establish 
00009          the frequency reference for natural chromatic middle C and tabulate the ratios of the scale.
00010          *****************************************************************************/
00011         para1();  // Step into this function to continue the tutorial
00012 }
00013 
00014 Real    R = 440.0;
00015 Real    cNat4 = R * 3.0/5.0; //264.00 Hz
00016 
00017 RealList naturalChromatic(
00018         1.0/1.0, 16.0/15.0, 9.0/8.0, 6.0/5.0,
00019         5.0/4.0, 4.0/3.0, 64.0/45.0, 3.0/2.0,
00020         8.0/5.0, 5.0/3.0, 16.0/9.0, 15.0/8.0
00021 );
00022 
00023 Static Void para1() {
00024         
00025         /*****************************************************************************
00026          Then
00027          *****************************************************************************/
00028         
00029         Print("A4=",  pitchToHz(A4 , cNat4, naturalChromatic));
00030         
00031         /*****************************************************************************
00032          prints A4=440.0, and
00033          *****************************************************************************/
00034         
00035         Print("C4=",  pitchToHz(C4 , cNat4, naturalChromatic));
00036         
00037         /*****************************************************************************
00038          prints C4=264.00.
00039          *****************************************************************************/
00040 }
